bug.author: theadityasam
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>URL(s) with the issue:</denchmark-h>
Please provide a link to the documentation entry, for example: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/blob/r2.0/site/en/api_docs/python/index.md>https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/blob/r2.0/site/en/api_docs/python/index.md</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>
The link for tf.debugging.assert_same_float_dtype is dead <denchmark-h:h3>Clear description</denchmark-h>
The previous link leads to: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/blob/r2.0/site/en/api_docs/python/tf/debugging/assert_same_float_dtype>https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/blob/r2.0/site/en/api_docs/python/tf/debugging/assert_same_float_dtype</denchmark-link>
The new link must be: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/blob/r2.0/site/en/api_docs/python/tf/debugging/assert_same_float_dtype.md>https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/blob/r2.0/site/en/api_docs/python/tf/debugging/assert_same_float_dtype.md</denchmark-link>
(The .md file extension is missing in the link) <denchmark-h:h3>Submit a pull request?</denchmark-h>
Yes, will be updating the issue soon enough

comments.comment: Hi, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/theadityasam>@theadityasam</denchmark-link> , I just checked <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/blob/r2.0/site/en/api_docs/python/index.md>https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/blob/r2.0/site/en/api_docs/python/index.md</denchmark-link> , let's call that <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/blob/r2.0/site/en/api_docs/python/index.md>index</denchmark-link> , and none of the links work. It's not only for , they do however work when I append at the end. I guess this means a complete modification of the contents of the file . Please update your title as well as per the issue.
Is it okay if I look into this instead? Should be pretty easy for me.

Hey <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Rubix982>@Rubix982</denchmark-link>
Sure, work on the issue. I saw your PR, from what I gather, the index.md is generated by some script and I guess it's not as simple as adding .md to the url's(not really sure about that, need to ask the code owners once). Also, I believe the API docs were moved to the TF website and were deprecated in the previous versions.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/theadityasam>@theadityasam</denchmark-link>
As there is a PR to monitor the issue, please confirm if we may move this to closed status.
Don't think it's right to close the issue until the PR is merged

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/theadityasam>@theadityasam</denchmark-link> PR successfully merged at <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/pull/1517>tensorflow/docs#1517</denchmark-link> . This issue can be closed now.
